data.email: Enter your Renpho Outdated account email address.
data.refresh: Set the data refresh rate in seconds. Default is 60 seconds.
data.unit_of_measurement: Choose the unit of measurement for weight. Options are kilograms (kg) or pounds (lbs).
data.proxy: Optional: Specify a proxy server to use (e.g., 'http://127.0.0.1:8080').
